name: fullstack_open_round_3
description: Round 3 of the FullStack Open MOOC by University of Helsinki
author: Elisa <elisa.naskali@gmail.com>

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack_open/round_2/puhelinluettelot && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstack_open_round_3/
scripts.deploy:full: yarn run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && yarn run deploy
